p: With respect to other insects directly linked to the areas gradually overtaken by goldenrods, the final effect is definitely unfavourable. For example in Poland, a significant reduction in the diversity of native meadow plants, caused mainly by strong allelopathy of goldenrods, affected the overall wealth of many insect groups [ 10], and nesting birds [ 11]. Strong allelopathy of goldenrod along with seeds equipped with pappus that is adjusted for anemochory make these plants dominating in many kinds of plant communities [ 9].
